attributes.action: abolish intermediate maths GCSE teaching in schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having learned maths only to the Intermediate level at the end of Year 11 (GCSE) means children cannot go on to do science at A level because they do not have the grounding they will need. Setting is fine, but make all sets do the full course, or at least have access to it.
